summary: A GPU‑accelerated single‑precision matrix multiplication example that compiles a custom CUDA SGEMM kernel with CuPy, launches it via the low‑level cuLaunchKernel interface, and offers a command‑line script plus benchmarking utilities to evaluate performance.
business_intent: Show developers how to integrate and benchmark custom CUDA kernels in Python using CuPy, enabling performance testing and flexible execution of SGEMM operations on selected GPUs.
